HIPAA_Requirement_Description: Develop implement and maintain a comprehensive security management process
Designate a security official responsible for security management process

SCF_Control_Name: Applicable Statutory Regulatory Contractual Requirements Definition
HIPAA_Requirement_Description: Identify and analyze security requirements and implement policies and procedures
Conduct a security risk analysis and assessment
Document risk analysis and assessment activities
Implement policies and procedures to manage identified risks
Develop report mechanism for security management process status

Perform periodic risk assessment of protected health information
Design and implement safeguards to control identified risks
Monitor and adjust security program based on risk assessment results
Maintain information systems containing protected health information
Document systems that store process or transmit protected health information
Maintain inventory of information systems
Track systems that store process or transmit protected health information
Assess relative criticality of applications and data
Maintain record of movements of hardware and electronic media
